verses.name: 2 Samuel 11:24
verses.text: And the shooters shot from off the wall upon thy servants; and some of the king’s servants be dead, and thy servant Uriah the Hittite is dead also.

verses.name: 2 Samuel 11:25
verses.text: Then David said unto the messenger, Thus shalt thou say unto Joab, Let not this thing displease thee, for the sword devoureth one as well as another: make thy battle more strong against the city, and overthrow it: and encourage thou him.

verses.name: 2 Samuel 11:26
verses.text: And when the wife of Uriah heard that Uriah her husband was dead, she mourned for her husband.
